Title: Ys IV: The Dawn of Ys
Description: ['This was an animated promotional video that Falcom commissioned for ', Ys IV: The Dawn of Ys, ' game for PC Engine, to shop around to various production houses. This was done in hopes of getting it made into a full-scale animated series/movie/etc., but it never panned out.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: You Tube)']
